FuncDef: The display lldp mdn neighbor command displays MAC address discovery neighbor (MDN) information about a specific or all interfaces. The display lldp mdn neighbor command displays MAC address discovery neighbor (MDN) information about a specific or all interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays MDN neighbor information on a specified interface.
If this parameter is not specified, MDN neighbor information on all interfaces is displayed.
-

ExtraInfo:
To view MDN neighbor information, run the display lldp mdn neighbor command. The command output helps check MDN neighbors, Layer 2 information about these neighbors, and interfaces used by these neighbors to connect to the local device.
To view the MDN neighbors of the local device and the MAC addresses of these MDN neighbors, run the display lldp mdn neighbor command.
